verses.roman:
mahāprabhu āsi' sei āsane vasila
dekhi' rāghavera mane ānanda bāḍila

synonyms: mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āsi'-coming; sei āsane—on that seat; vasila—sat down; dekhi'-seeing; rāghavera mane—in the mind of Rāghava Paṇḍita; ānanda—great happiness; bāḍila—increased.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu came there and sat down at His place. Seeing this, Rāghava Paṇḍita felt increasing happiness. Rāghava Paṇḍita felt increasing happiness.
